summary:
Summon a Werewolf ! WORKING !!!
I fixed the crash issue...
descriptionHtml:
This time its working correctly and the game dont crashes once the werewolf disappears! 
I\'m very very sorry for my broken previous file... I hope you people download this one and enjoy it with no problems....

=========================================================================================
FOR THOSE WHO HAVE A CRASH TO DESKTOP PROBLEM WHEN THE WEREWOLF DISAPPEARS.
DOWNLOAD THE SCRIPT FILE AND UNRAR TO YOUR GAME DATA FOLDER ( THE SCRIPTS FOLDER, NOT JUST THE FILE WITHIN IT ). THIS SHOULD DO IT ! 
THERE IS NO NEED DOWNLOAD THE MOD FILE AGAIN, JUST THE SCRIPT. WORKS BOTH WITH V1.2 AND V1.3.
=========================================================================================

Version 1.3
- Added a small stone standing in the Underforge (to fit with the others there) for the spellbook
- Added a second spellbook inside Bloated Man\'s Grotto. The \"Ill Met By Moonlight\" quest (can be taken in Falkreath and its relative to werewolves) will lead you there. But you dont need to be a werewolf or take the quest to go and find it. The spellbook is on a stone pedestal at the very end of the place\'s round course. Also there is a short light beam to draw some attention to the spot. You can see the light from the starting open space to your left, but have to go all the way around to take the book.

============================================================
[youtube]HLgrAFJi2Y0[/youtube]
============================================================

Special thanks to jefthereaper for his great ideas!

Version 1.2
This mod adds a new conjuration spell that allows you to summon a 50lvl Werewolf for 60 seconds to help you in battle. Its based on summon Arniel\'s shade spell and requires conjuration skill 25
You can learn the spell from an added conjure Werewolf spelltome. The spelltome can be found inside the Underforge, close to the entrance, on a rock to the right. You can spot it very easily once you enter.

To install , unrar the .esp file to your game Data folder and activate it from SkyrimLauncher.

I dont think that conflicts with anything...

Thank you... and sorry again...


My other Mods :

- Improve & Create
  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10259

- Skull Masks
  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15769
author: DeathGR
